page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE.........
page.content: Cars speed past on the road outside.The sun is shining but by this afternoon it may well rain.The paper boy posts a copy of a national newspaper through the front door.It costs 20 pence. Later the postman will deliver any letters that have been posted.A letter takes about 2 days to arrive.It costs about 17p. -------------------------------------- CREDITS This material was compiled by the pup- ils of II.1.C Myton School in Warwick. Special thanks go to their teachers MR WELLS, MR EWEN, MR WALKER, and MR HUDSON for all their very hard work in organising the data collection. Also special thanks to MR EWEN, MRS HILL and MISS J.HALLIWELL for colla- ting and entering the data. -2.30AM 18th JULY 1985-
